name: Air Zoom Pegasus 40
longDescription: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40 features Zoom Air units in forefoot, engineered mesh upper for breathability, and wider toe box for natural movement during long runs.

name: Future Rider Neo
longDescription: Puma Future Rider Neo combines 80s racing heritage with modern comfort. Features Rider Foam midsole and rubber outsole with gum details.

name: Floatride Energy 5
longDescription: Reebok Floatride Energy 5 with responsive Floatride Foam midsole, breathable mesh upper, and flex grooves for natural foot movement.

name: D'Lites 3.0
longDescription: Skechers D'Lites 3.0 features air-cooled memory foam insole, platform wedge design, and synthetic leather upper for retro-modern style.

name: HOVR Phantom 3
longDescription: Under Armour HOVR Phantom 3 with energy-returning HOVR foam, compression mesh upper, and embedded sensor tracking stride metrics.

name: Fresh Foam X 1080v13
longDescription: New Balance Fresh Foam X 1080v13 features ultra-soft Fresh Foam midsole, Hypoknit upper for adaptive fit, and blown rubber outsole.

name: Timberland PRO
longDescription: Timberland PRO Men's 6 Pit Boss Boot with steel toe, anti-fatigue technology, and slip-resistant outsole. Premium full-grain leather.

name: Desert Trek II
longDescription: Clarks Originals Desert Trek II features crepe rubber sole, premium leather upper, and signature two-eyelet lace system.

name: Axilus 2 Energized
longDescription: Fila Men's Axilus 2 Energized with EVA midsole, mesh upper for breathability, and rubber outsole with flex grooves.

name: Woods Edge Pro
longDescription: Woodland Men's Edge Pro with waterproof leather upper, anti-slip rubber outsole, and cushioned midsole for trekking.
